summary: Frontend changes implement correct profile routing in the directory UI, URL-driven profile editing, improved own-profile loading behavior, and a new teddy storybook gallery item with lightbox rendering. Backend changes shown are truncated and do not provide clear evidence that the profiles directory listing now returns each profileâ€™s Principal as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend directory listing must include the owner Principal for each profile so the frontend can route each card to `/profiles/$principal`.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend now expects `actor.listDirectoryProfiles()` to return tuples of `(Principal, UserProfile)` and maps them to `{ principal, profile }`, but the backend diff excerpt is truncated and does not show `listDirectoryProfiles` (or any change proving it returns principals).

hallucinated_features.description: Supporter request/approval/revocation system added to the backend (SupporterRequest/SupporterProfile types and related admin/user methods).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest (which focuses on profiles directory linking/editing and a gallery storybook item).
